doc.name: browserDocumentCompleteFrame
doc.summary: Sent when a browser object finishes loading a url in a frame

examples.example:
on browserDocumentCompleteFrame
set the enabled of button "Go" to true
end browserDocumentCompleteFrame

description.p: The browserDocumentCompleteFrame message is sent to the current card of a stack containing a browser object when the browser object has finished loading a url and all its dependent resources in a frame.
If the target is the main frame of the browser then the browserDocumentComplete message is sent instead.
The url is the url that finished loading in a frame
The instanceId is the integer identifier of the browser object
Note: For general information on using the browser library, see the notes in the revBrowserOpen function reference.
